appDescription.message: Use ChatGPT to summarize any web page. Support GPT 3.5, GPT-4 and other models.

settingsPromptText.message: The readable text from the web page will be substituted at the end of the above prompt.

settingsPromptExample1.message: Please summarize the following article precisely in less than 100 words.

settingsPromptExample2.message: Please summarize the content with short bullet points and present them in a list.

settingsPromptExample3.message: Please generate a suitable caption for the text.

settingsTokenTip.message: Go to the OpenAI page to get your API Key.

utilsChatOpenAIError.message:
OpenAI API Key authentication failed.
Please check your configuration on the settings page.

configPrompt.message: Please summarize the following article precisely in less than 100 words.

settingsAzureKeyTip.message: Go to the Azure OpenAI Service page to get your API Key.
